api_list.api_description: Retrieve specific entry data from the Hyrule Compendium.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: The name or ID of the entry.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: The game version to query; defaults to 'botw'.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve the current XKCD comic and its metadata.

query: I'd like to know about the 'moblin' entry from the Hyrule Compendium and also want to see the current XKCD comic.
